    queue := flag.String("q", "", "The name of the queue")
    timeout := flag.Int64("t", 5, "How long, in seconds, that the message is hidden from others")
    flag.Parse()

    if *queue == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply the name of a queue (-q QUEUE)")
        return
    }

    if *timeout < 0 {
        *timeout = 0
    }

    if *timeout > 12*60*60 {
        *timeout = 12 * 60 * 60
    }
